Feature: Local file in current browser window
Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in the current
        Navigator window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.
Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Use of the native Win32 file picker to navigate through directories
        and open files (html, plaintext, image). Cancellation also tested.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the source window. Also
        should be able to use keyboard accelerators. Resize source window.
Access from main menu and access keys.
